row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 15)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 7)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
col_desc: Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
Queen has zero lip sync wins.
Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
